rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0001
rows.name:
Is this it? Will my unending thirst for knowledge
be satiated at long last?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yeah, so then...where is it all?
All I see is a whole lotta NOTHIN'.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0003
rows.name: It's so quiet... I feel like we're back in the cathedral.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0004
rows.name: Okay, Elma...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0004_2
rows.name: What's the deal here? Where are all the stasis capsules?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0005
rows.name: Where the hell are all our bodies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0007
rows.name: Don't tell me—this isn't the Core?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0008
rows.name: Whoa, what?! Seriously?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0009
rows.name: This has to be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0010
rows.name:
You all saw what the Core looked like
in the mission briefing—this is definitely it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0011
rows.name: Lin's right. This is the place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0012
rows.name: Then where are all the people we brought with us from Earth?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0013
rows.name:
You're all controlling these mims
from your real bodies, asleep in stasis...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0014
rows.name:
That's the explanation you were given
by NLA—or should I say, ECP—officials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0015
rows.name: That was the official story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0016
rows.name: But it's not the whole truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0017
rows.name: Colonel? What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0018
rows.name:
Wretched humans. You'd be dead already
if it wasn't for that blasted barrier![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0020
rows.name: What the—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0020_2
rows.name: It's that mech they stole from the hangar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0021
rows.name: Ganglion?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0022
rows.name: And he's an UGLY mother, eeesh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0023
rows.name:
You must be the Ganglion leader—
the one Lao spoke of. Luxaar, was it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0024
rows.name: That's him?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0025
rows.name:
Do not presume to address me—
you defile my name by even speaking it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0026
rows.name: Only the Great One may call me that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0027
rows.name: Great One?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0028
rows.name:
I am here to purge the universe of your disease,
once and for all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0029
rows.name: What are you so afraid of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0030
rows.name:
Destroying the Earth wasn't enough.
You had to chase down the survivors and destroy them too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0031
rows.name: What's their threat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0032
rows.name: You’d even risk flying that crippled mech—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0033
rows.name:
that’s right, isn’t it? It’s not complete.
It’s still missing something vital...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0034
rows.name:
Hmm... Interesting...
Then you're not entirely ignorant, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0035
rows.name:
Perhaps your human birthright allows you to sense it?
Even in that puppet shell...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0036
rows.name: Birthright?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0037
rows.name: You—you're no ordinary puppet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0038
rows.name:
You must be the one responsible for the Trion barrier...
the Skells... This whole blasted mess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0039
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0040
rows.name: Then...perhaps I am mistaken after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0041
rows.name: Perhaps humanity IS the failsafe of legend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0042
rows.name:
But you will not find the Ganglion content
to submit and resign ourselves to that fate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0043
rows.name:
No, instead I will purify this world
and prepare it for the advent of the Great One![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070150_MSG0044
rows.name: Now, humans—you die![ST:wait ]
